The idea. Today, we all have a smartphone (smart phone) in our pocket. The main objective of the project is to develop a software application that uses free software licenses for the search of partners on the different European projects.
The project aims to:
A) Share good practices among partners in the field of free software; B) Promote and articulate the joint work of the Educational Centers involved, belonging to different cultural, linguistic and socioeconomic contexts, etc.; C) Develop strategies to integrate the knowledge acquired in each curriculum of schools;
D) Involve students in the project; E) Planning and development of a website and an Android mobile application that implements the objectives set for the project;
F) Use of tools to disseminate activities; \ nG) Monitoring project progress; I) Evaluate the possibility of extending the project to other languages;
Resources produced by partners that will allow:
Development of a website, as well as an Android application, based on the good practices agreed by the partners that allows Registration of insitutions and research of partners of different projects, Research of European partners , Communication between partners to establish / build the project.
Visit website
IES Cristobal de Monroy. Coordinator. Alcalá de Guadaíra (Seville) Spain. Teaching Institute (ESO, Bachillerato and Vocational Training of Computing and Commerce) It has the ECHE letter and is currently participating in Erasmus + KA1 and KA2 projects.
FICA. Partner. The Federation of Industrialists and Merchants of Alcalá de Guadaira (Seville) Spain is an intersectorial business organization of local scope.
ITIS Carlo Grassi. Partner. Turin Italy. High school in the north of Italy, with a strong focus on ITC, Electrotechnics and Automation, Aeronautical Engineering, Transport and Logistics.
Instituto Politécnico de Santarém. Partner. Santarem. Portugal. It is a public higher education institution and consists of the following Schools: Agriculture, Sports, Education, Management and Technology and Health.
Why use this page?
This page is intended to be a tool to help the search for partners of future European projects.
How does it work?
To use this page you must register first.
1st REGISTRATION During the Registration you will be asked for the following information:
Data from the Work Center. In this section you will be asked for the following data from your work center.
Name of the centre: Street: City: Country: e-mail: Type of Center: Here you must select if it is a school (Primary, Secondary, ...) a company (Company) a public institution (Public Institution) or another type of organization (NGO, ...) Enter your PIC. The PIC is a very important data that your institution must have in order to carry out any European project. You can check your PIC here You can get the PIC for your institution here. In case of not having PIC please enter 000.
2060/5000
Personal information. In this section you will be asked for the following personal information. Name: Surname: email: Password: Repeat the password:
Select area: In this section you must select your area of ​​work or personal specialization. Type of project You must indicate in what type of project you wish to participate, or if you already have one indicate the type. Being able to be KA1 (101, 102, ...) KA2 (201,202, ....) Project name: (Optional) Once the conditions and the captcha of the page are accepted, you and your institution will receive an email that must be confirmed. If you do not receive the email, please check the Spam folder. You will not be able to login until you have confirmed both emails (your institution and you).
2º SEARCH OF PARTNERS.
In order to search for partners, you must complete all the steps in the previous section. Login with your personal email as username and the password you entered in the registry. If you do not remember the password you can request a new one. When you have made the login you can search for the partners that are registered in the system. For this you have a filter that will ask you:
Country: Select area: Type of Center: Select type of project: The system will show all the possible partners that comply with the filters that have been requested. Clicking on the button
It will allow you to send an email to the person who has registered, it is advisable to share your email. You will not have direct access to the email of the partner with whom you wish to contact, only if you share yours could you get in touch in a faster way. The system does not store any email of the sent only the data to put in contact the partners. Only your personal email will be shared if you wish.
Yfys team wishes you luck
